torch.name: Torch
torch.description: A basic torch. Useful in dark places (later).

lost_satchel.name: Lost Satchel
lost_satchel.description: A missing travel bag. Return it to the Guild.

nephil_relic_ankh.name: Nephil Relic: Sun Ankh
nephil_relic_ankh.description: A relic of the lost Nephil civilization.

nephil_relic_map.name: Nephil Relic: Star Map
nephil_relic_map.description: A relic etched with constellations older than the empire.

nephil_relic_crown.name: Nephil Relic: Crown of Dust
nephil_relic_crown.description: The last king's crown. It hums with a wrong kind of memory.

head_miner_token.name: Head Miner's Tag
head_miner_token.description: Proof the head miner made it back. Return to the Guild.

rival_rescue_badge.name: Rival Rescue Badge
rival_rescue_badge.description: Proof you brought your rival back alive.

nimrods_bow.name: Nimrod's Bow
nimrods_bow.description: An artifact carved with layered scripts. It feels like language made solid.

babel_tablet.name: Babel Tablet
babel_tablet.description: A tablet covered in mixed languages. Bring it to the Archivist.

arrowhead_map.name: Arrowhead Map
arrowhead_map.description: A brittle map marked with glacial ridges and a distant island.

arrowhead_tip.name: Arrow Tip Fragment
arrowhead_tip.description: A shard of the bow's power that refused to vanish. It hums like a warning.

relic_shard.name: Relic Shard
relic_shard.description: A fragment of an old carving. Valuable to the Guild/Archivist.

whip.name: Leather Whip
whip.description: A trusty whip. +1 ATK when equipped.

rusty_sword.name: Rusty Sword
rusty_sword.description: Seen better days. +2 ATK when equipped.

machete.name: Jungle Machete
machete.description: Cuts vines and foes. +3 ATK when equipped.

expedition_coat.name: Expedition Coat
expedition_coat.description: A sturdy coat. +1 DEF and +2 Max HP when equipped.

lucky_charm.name: Lucky Charm
lucky_charm.description: A worn charm. +2 Max HP when equipped.

iron_ring.name: Iron Ring
iron_ring.description: Plain, but tough. +1 DEF when equipped.

eagle_eye.name: Eagle Eye Charm
eagle_eye.description: Keeps you sharp. +1 ATK when equipped.
